content: bonney lake cowl is a neck warmer that is 23 5 inches around and 10 inches tall---just right for keeping your neck warm but not strangling you this is a charted pattern that you knit using 2 colors at a time the corrugated ribbing keeps the edges from rolling knit picks palette fingering weight 100% wool yarn cream mc 122 yds rainforrest heather 46 yds tidepool heather 30 yds autumn heather 51 yds coriander heather 41 yds salsa heather 36 yds
